description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Banoffee Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate Banoffee Pies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 50g plain dark chocolate, shaved or grated

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the crushed biscuits between 4 tall glasses. Spoon over the caramel and scatter the banana slices on top.
Top each portion with a spoonful of cream and decorate with the chocolate. Serve immediately.
